actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act in order to give the Interstate Commerce Commission certain authority over railroad car service when an emergency is or may be imminent.

summary.text: Provides the Interstate Commerce Commission with authority to regulate railroad car service when an emergency is or may be imminent. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1(15))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act in order to give the Interstate Commerce Commission certain authority over railroad car service when an emergency is or may be imminent.
